cast.name: 斯内日娜·佩特洛娃 Snezhina Petrova

awards:
第66届柏林国际电影节(2016)
　　新生代少年单元 国际评审团最佳长片(提名) 伊丽莎·佩特科娃

writer.name: 伊丽莎·佩特科娃 Eliza Petkova

director.name: 伊丽莎·佩特科娃 Eliza Petkova

introduction: Lora, a 17 years old girl, has to deal with her father's death. In the small Bulgarian village where time seems to stand still, her family and the villagers expect her to give herself over to grief. From now on, she must wear black, not listen to any music and observe various mourning rituals. However, Lora wants to keep on enjoying her youth but her desire to live a normal life is disrupted by the judgment of others, who force her to play the role of an orphan.
